TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1131-1132
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Sheriff of the Colony, xx-xx-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to sheriff, June 7, 1825. Order for arrest of Buckner.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1131-1132

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to sheriff, June 7, 1825. Order for arrest of Buckner.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*To the *person_mentioned*Sheriff of this Colony*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*You are hereby commanded to take the Body of*person_mentioned* A. C. Buckner */person_mentioned*and bring him before me at my *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*in this place on Saturday the *date_mentioned n="06-11-1825">11 day of this month*/date_mentioned* between the hours of 10 o clock of the forenoon and two o clock of the afternoon then and there to answer charges of disorderly and seditious conduct against the *person_mentioned*Authorities of the Govt*/person_mentioned* and against the peace and tranquility of this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Stephen F Austin]*/p*
*/div1*
